Title: HalloweenVIII: Resurrection
Writer: Debra Hill (characters), John Carpenter (characters), Larry Brand (story), Larry Brand (screenplay), Sean Hood (screenplay)
Actors: Jamie Lee Curtis, Brad Loree, Busta Rhymes, Bianca Kajlich
Plot: Three years after he last terrorized his sister, Michael Myers confronts her again, before traveling to Haddonfield to deal with the cast and crew of a reality show which is being broadcast from his old home.
Production: Dimension Films, Trancas International Films Inc., Nightfall Productions
